summary:
Unique Follower: Garrett from the Thief Serie.
- Fully Voice acted
- Quests
- And much more!
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1398128328.png [/img]
GARRETT - UNIQUE THIEF COMPANION
By TheSkoomaKing
Requirement: The latest version of skyrim.

To avoid copyright issues I choose to make the voices myself. Like it or leave it!


[img] http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1398087829.png [/img]
- Fully Voice acted and lip synced!

- Quests

- Garrett´s Hideout

- WANNA LOOK LIKE GARRETT?!

- Tactical Garrett

- Recommended mods

============================================================================================
============================================================================================

QUESTS:

- Quest to become partner with Garrett.

- As a master thief, Garrett knows where loot can be found. He will give you advice on where to look for items worth of stealing.



============================================================================================
============================================================================================

GARRETT´S HIDEOUT

A small but coozy home for you to share with Garrett once you have completed his partnership quests.




============================================================================================
============================================================================================

WANNA LOOK LIKE GARRETT?

Well now you can, his eye is available to you when you create a new character or open the Race menu => ShowRaceMenu

Male only (for now)


============================================================================================
============================================================================================
TACTICAL GARRETT

There is alot of ways Garrett can be customized to fit your playstyle.

Concealment: Want Garrett to be invisible when you are stealthing?
Default: Concealed

Silence: Want Garrett to be silent when walking around?
(other words, he wont talk during combat etc) for immersion
Default: Not Silent

============================================================================================
============================================================================================

Recommended Mods:

Garrett´s Armor:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45509/?

Blackjack:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33034/?

Bandolier - Bags and Pouches:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/?

Face Masks of Skyrim:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33391/?


[img] http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1398134944.png [/img]

Place all files in your Skyrim Directory/Data

[img] http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1398141020.png [/img]

Delete the esp: Garrett Unique Thief Companion.esp

go into the script folder and delete all scripts starting with " GUTC ".

[img] http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1398107852.png [/img]

- more topics and dialogue with Garrett!

- Basso - Meeting Garrett´s Fence!

- Big Heists
once you´ve stolen enough goods with Garrett, he will tell you about big heists for you two to complete.

- More items for you and Garrett to steal!

- Female version of the glowing eye!



Final notes:

Garrett uses the following perks:
Light Fingers
Lightfoot
Stealth
Unhindered
Muffled Movement
Night Thief
Light Touch
Deadly Aim
Cutpurse
Bladesman
[center][img] http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1398124731.jpg [/img][/center]
author: TheSkoomaKing
